title: Is it bad to read real scary stories? - Quora

response.answer_text: In my experience, no. If that is the type of story you like, it is perfectly ok to read these stories. In other ways, sometimes it can be bad for your health, as in it may cause insomnia or take your anxiety levels to the extreme. Again, thousands of people LOVE scary stories and base their lives off of them.

Don’t worry about it. If you believe you are mature enough, you will be able to read it. After reading a scary story, you may feel scared (NSS). You may also find it hard to relax and feel traumatized. If this occurs, you know you aren’t in a good state to sleep or read another one. I prefer to read a factual book after a scary story as it helps me forget about it. I hope this helps.
